file.name: statements.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Boost statements
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8094
paths:
  '/accounts/{accountId}/meters':
    get:
      summary: Get Meters, associated with an account, and its service start and end dates (SSD...SED)
      parameters:
        - { $ref: '#/components/parameters/accountId' }
        - { $ref: '#/components/parameters/coerceBoolean' }
        - { $ref: '#/components/parameters/coerceNumber' }
        - { $ref: '#/components/parameters/coerceInteger' }
        - { $ref: '#/components/parameters/coerceObject' }
      responses:
        'default': { $ref: '#/components/responses/HttpErrorResponse' }
        '200':
          description: An list of meters for an account
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountMeterBase' }

components:
  responses:
    HttpErrorResponse:
      description: Error Response
      content:
        application/json:
          schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/HttpError' }

  parameters:
    accountId:
      name: accountId
      in: path
      schema:
        type: string
      required: true

    coerceBoolean:
      name: bool
      in: query
      description: Should test boolean
      schema:
        type: boolean

    coerceNumber:
      name: num
      in: query
      description: Should test number
      schema:
        type: number

    coerceInteger:
      name: int
      in: query
      description: Should test integer
      schema:
        type: integer

    coerceObject:
      name: obj
      in: query
      description: Should test boolean
      schema:
        type: object
        properties:
          bool:
            type: boolean
          int:
            type: integer

  schemas:
    HttpError:
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

    # AccountMeter
    # =======================================

    AccountMeterBase:
      properties:
        tariffName:
          type: string
        plan:
          type: string
        objBool:
          type: boolean
        objInt:
          type: integer
        bool:
          type: boolean
        int:
          type: integer
        num:
          type: number
        address:
          type: string
        postCode:
          type: string
        mpxn:
          type: string
        msn:
          type: string
        startDate:
          type: string
          format: date
        endDate:
          type: string
          format: date
      required:
        - tariffName
        - plan
        - address
        - postCode
        - mpxn
        - msn
        - startDate
        - endDate

    AccountMeterElec:
      allOf:
        - { $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountMeterBase' }
        - properties:
            meterType:
              enum: ['elec']
            profileClassId:
              type: string
            meterTimeswitchCode:
              type: string
            lineLossFactorClassId:
              type: string
          required:
            - meterType
            - profileClassId
            - meterTimeswitchCode
            - lineLossFactorClassId

    AccountMeterGas:
      allOf:
        - { $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountMeterBase' }
        - properties:
            meterType:
              enum: ['gas']
            ldz:
              type: string
          required: ['meterType', 'ldz']

    AccountMeter:
      oneOf:
        - { $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountMeterElec' }
        - { $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountMeterGas' }
      discriminator:
        propertyName: meterType
